001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.http;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PersistencePort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageEvent;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessagePair;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageType;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.TransactionId;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
010import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
011import java.io.BufferedWriter;
012import java.io.IOException;
013import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
014import java.nio.channels.FileChannel;
015import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
016import java.nio.file.Files;
017import java.nio.file.Path;
018import java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption;
019import java.time.Instant;
020import java.time.ZoneId;
021import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
022import java.util.Map;
023
024/**
025 * Writes HTTP message pairs in the legacy SegmentSink blob/index format.
026 * <p>Synchronizes writes to append request/response payloads to a shared blob and emits matching
027 * index entries. Optionally delegates non-HTTP pairs to another {@link PersistencePort}.
028 *
029 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
030 */
031public final class HttpSegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter implements PersistencePort {
032  private static final DateTimeFormatter STAMP =
033      DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("uuuuMMdd-HHmmss").withZone(ZoneId.systemDefault());
034
035  private final FileChannel blob;
036  private final BufferedWriter index;
037  private final String blobName;
038  private final String indexName;
039  private final PersistencePort fallback;
040
041  /**
042   * Creates an HTTP segment sink without a fallback.
043   *
044   * @param directory output directory for blob/index files
045   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code directory} is {@code null}
046   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
047   */  public HttpSegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter(Path directory) {
048    this(directory, null);
049  }
050
051  /**
052   * Creates an HTTP segment sink with an optional fallback for non-HTTP pairs.
053   *
054   * @param directory output directory for blob/index files
055   * @param fallback optional persistence fallback for other protocols
056   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code directory} is {@code null}
057   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
058   */  public HttpSegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter(Path directory, PersistencePort fallback) {
059    try {
060      Files.createDirectories(directory);
061      String stamp = STAMP.format(Instant.now());
062      this.blobName = "blob-" + stamp + ".seg";
063      this.indexName = "index-" + stamp + ".ndjson";
064      this.blob =
065          FileChannel.open(
066              directory.resolve(blobName),
067              StandardOpenOption.CREATE,
068              StandardOpenOption.WRITE,
069              StandardOpenOption.READ);
070      this.blob.position(blob.size());
071      this.index =
072          Files.newBufferedWriter(
073              directory.resolve(indexName), StandardCharsets.UTF_8, StandardOpenOption.CREATE, StandardOpenOption.APPEND);
074      this.fallback = fallback;
075    } catch (IOException e) {
076      throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to initialize HTTP segment sink", e);
077    }
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Writes HTTP request/response payloads to disk, delegating other protocols to the fallback.
082   *
083   * @param pair message pair to persist; {@code null} is ignored
084   * @throws Exception if writing fails or the fallback throws
085   * @implNote Flushes headers/body metadata to disk on each call to preserve crash consistency.
086   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
087   */  @Override
088  public synchronized void persist(MessagePair pair) throws Exception {
089    if (pair == null) return;
090    boolean handled = false;
091    if (isHttp(pair.request())) {
092      writeEvent(pair.request(), "REQ");
093      handled = true;
094    }
095    if (isHttp(pair.response())) {
096      writeEvent(pair.response(), "RSP");
097      handled = true;
098    }
099    if (!handled && fallback != null) {
100      fallback.persist(pair);
101    }
102  }
103
104  private boolean isHttp(MessageEvent event) {
105    return event != null && event.protocol() == ProtocolId.HTTP && event.payload() != null;
106  }
107
108  private void writeEvent(MessageEvent event, String kind) throws Exception {
109    ByteStream stream = event.payload();
110    byte[] data = stream.data();
111    int headersEnd = findHeadersEnd(data);
112    byte[] headers;
113    byte[] body;
114    if (headersEnd >= 0) {
115      headers = new byte[headersEnd];
116      System.arraycopy(data, 0, headers, 0, headersEnd);
117      int bodyLen = data.length - headersEnd;
118      body = new byte[bodyLen];
119      System.arraycopy(data, headersEnd, body, 0, bodyLen);
120    } else {
121      headers = data;
122      body = new byte[0];
123    }
124
125    FiveTuple flow = stream.flow();
126    String src = endpoint(flow, stream.fromClient());
127    String dst = endpoint(flow, !stream.fromClient());
128    String id = event.metadata() != null ? event.metadata().transactionId() : null;
129    if (id == null) {
130      id = TransactionId.newId();
131    }
132    String session = event.metadata() != null ? event.metadata().attributes().getOrDefault("session", null) : null;
133
134    long headersOff = blob.position();
135    blob.write(ByteBuffer.wrap(headers));
136    long headersLen = blob.position() - headersOff;
137
138    long bodyOff = blob.position();
139    if (body.length > 0) {
140      blob.write(ByteBuffer.wrap(body));
141    }
142    long bodyLen = blob.position() - bodyOff;
143
144    String firstLine = extractFirstLine(headers);
145    String json =
146        new StringBuilder(256)
147            .append('{')
148            .append("\"ts_first\":").append(stream.timestampMicros())
149            .append(",\"ts_last\":").append(stream.timestampMicros())
150            .append(",\"id\":\"").append(id).append('\"')
151            .append(",\"kind\":\"").append(kind).append('\"')
152            .append(",\"session\":").append(session == null ? "null" : ('\"' + escape(session) + '\"'))
153            .append(",\"src\":\"").append(escape(src)).append('\"')
154            .append(",\"dst\":\"").append(escape(dst)).append('\"')
155            .append(",\"first_line\":\"").append(escape(firstLine)).append('\"')
156            .append(",\"headers_blob\":\"").append(blobName).append('\"')
157            .append(",\"headers_off\":").append(headersOff)
158            .append(",\"headers_len\":").append(headersLen)
159            .append(",\"body_blob\":\"").append(blobName).append('\"')
160            .append(",\"body_off\":").append(bodyOff)
161            .append(",\"body_len\":").append(bodyLen)
162            .append('}')
163            .toString();
164
165    index.write(json);
166    index.newLine();
167    index.flush();
168    blob.force(false);
169  }
170
171  private static int findHeadersEnd(byte[] data) {
172    for (int i = 0; i + 3 < data.length; i++) {
173      if (data[i] == 13 && data[i + 1] == 10 && data[i + 2] == 13 && data[i + 3] == 10) {
174        return i + 4;
175      }
176    }
177    return -1;
178  }
179
180  private static String endpoint(FiveTuple flow, boolean fromClient) {
181    if (fromClient) {
182      return flow.srcIp() + ":" + flow.srcPort();
183    }
184    return flow.dstIp() + ":" + flow.dstPort();
185  }
186
187  private static String extractFirstLine(byte[] headers) {
188    int limit = headers.length;
189    for (int i = 0; i < limit - 1; i++) {
190      if (headers[i] == '\r' && headers[i + 1] == '\n') {
191        return new String(headers, 0, i, StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1).trim();
192      }
193    }
194    return new String(headers, StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1).trim();
195  }
196
197  private static String escape(String value) {
198    StringBuilder b = new StringBuilder(value.length() + 16);
199    for (int i = 0; i < value.length(); i++) {
200      char c = value.charAt(i);
201      switch (c) {
202        case '"', '\\' -> b.append('\\').append(c);
203        case '\n' -> b.append("\\n");
204        case '\r' -> b.append("\\r");
205        case '\t' -> b.append("\\t");
206        default -> {
207          if (c < 0x20) {
208            b.append(' ');
209          } else {
210            b.append(c);
211          }
212        }
213      }
214    }
215    return b.toString();
216  }
217
218  /**
219   * Flushes and closes blob/index streams and the fallback sink.
220   *
221   * @throws Exception if closing the fallback fails
222   * @implNote Forces blob metadata to disk before chaining to the fallback.
223   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
224   */  @Override
225  public synchronized void close() throws Exception {
226    try {
227      index.flush();
228    } finally {
229      try {
230        index.close();
231      } finally {
232        blob.force(true);
233        blob.close();
234        if (fallback != null) {
235          fallback.close();
236        }
237      }
238    }
239  }
240}
241
242
